column1: The '''Inland Northwest Tolkien Society''' is a US registered Smial of [[The Tolkien Society]].
The Inland Northwest Tolkien Society runs the Tolkien Scholars Website
column2: a site ''"intended as a central repository for Tolkien scholars and enthusiasts looking for a single location to aide in learning and researching information related to J.R.R. Tolkien and his works"''
column3: and also serves as the home of the Society.

column1: Central figures of the Society include [[Hawke Robinson]] and Brian Huseland.
